MessageId.title: Message Identifier
MessageId.description: Unique identifier of the inbound cop check as assigned by ClearBank.

InteractionId.title: Interaction Identifier
InteractionId.description: Interaction identifier of the inbound cop check.

RequestName.title: Request Name
RequestName.description: Name that the requestor is trying to get CoP on.

RequestSortCode.title: Request Sort Code
RequestSortCode.description: Sort code that is entered on the request.

RequestAccountNumber.title: Request Account Number
RequestAccountNumber.description: Account Number entered on the request.

RequestAccountType.title: Request Account Type
RequestAccountType.description: Account type that is entered (Personal or Business).

OwnerName.title: Owner Name
OwnerName.description: Actual owner name with ClearBank (where possible).

ReasonCode.title: Reason Code
ReasonCode.description: Specific code (e.g.: BAMM, ANNM etc. IF MatchResult: TRUE, then no reason code is needed).

ClientName.title: Client Name
ClientName.description: Name of the institution requesting the CoP.

RequestTimeStampUTC.title: Request timestamp UTC
RequestTimeStampUTC.description: Time when the request was made.
